2021420.name: Plane Accident Demo
2021420.description:
Become an inspector examining causes of plane crash. Visit the crash site, gather evidence and interrogate witnesses. Explain whether the accident was caused by independent factors or human errors. Experience all of this in Plane Accident demo today!

Take on the character of an aircraft accident inspector and explain the causes of crashes in. Travel to the crash sites, where you will have to:

- secure the crash site

- gather evidence

- create photographic documentation

Having collected the evidence, go to the hangar and solve the puzzle:

- inspect the aeroplane parts

- interrogate witnesses

- reconstruct the wreckage

- check the technical documentation

Discover whether the accident was caused by human error an unfortunate coincidence.
2021420.supported_languages:
英语*, 波兰语
*具有完全音频支持的语言
